website_summaries.verdict: This gorgeous, sturdy urn will provide the perfect eternal spot for any loved one. Has earned comments about how "stunning" it looks in person.
pros: Stands out for its intricate details that include etched trim and mother of pearl enamel finish
Made of brass that's coated in nickel for beauty and durability
cons: Some reports of marks and uneven areas in the finish have been noted

customer_reviews.title: Stunning ♡
customer_reviews.text: This urn is amazingly beautiful! Even the funeral director was impressed and wanted to to know where I got it. I chose this one because I wanted something that was as beautiful as my sweet mama, and it did not disappoint. It came w/ a velvet bag. The lid screws on. The company sent a very nice email. These pictures don't do it justice (horrible lighting).
customer_reviews.author: RiverQueenCandi

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably BEAUTIFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: This urn is unbelievably beautiful!!! The pictures do not do it justice, and, it is so much prettier in person. When I opened the box, the beauty of this urn took my breath away! This urn would have cost over $400 at the funeral home. Overnight shipping was lightning fast. It was guaranteed by 8pm, and arrived shortly after noon. This is the best purchase I have ever made on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: This urn is beautiful! Simple
customer_reviews.text: This urn is beautiful! Simple, Clean, and Elegant. Nice weight and good size. I have to pay over $300 for a similar urn at a funeral home. If I must find a negative, the inside is bare metal and it would've been a perfection if the inside was lined. But honestly, I think I am asking too much for the price point. Also, when I open the lid the smell from the inside was a bit unpleasant. Smell of metal.... I am going to air it and throw in some dry rosemary and it should be fine. I am so happy with this product. LOVE
customer_reviews.author: tnt

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This was an absolutely gorgeous urn and I wasn't disappointed by a single part of it! When I moved my 78 year old uncle in with us to take care of him I found that he still had my aunt in the bag and box that came from having here cremated some time ago. Because he is legally blind and worried about an urn that would break if dropped I focused on a solid construction. This urn is incredibly robust and the build quality was evident upon opening. I would recommend this urn to anyone looking for a quality urn that looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Very nice urn 5/5
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive to buy an urn off of amazon, I sort of felt that $100 was going cheap for a loved one but couldn't believe that funeral homes wanted several hundred dollars more for urns that looked exactly the same. I am impressed with the quality and sturdiness of the urn, it certainly doesn't look cheap. The scales on it almost resemble wings, which is a nice touch. Would recommend 👍
customer_reviews.author: ladysocks

customer_reviews.title: The best price for a quality product. Would have paid more
customer_reviews.text: We needed a beautiful urn for my brother. My mother was so pleased. It is a great product of quality and beauty. It helps to know you have the best for a loved one to give proper dignity to his life. Better than the picture. Also 75% savings from funeral home urns.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I never thought that I would be buying an urn off of Amazon. This urn was just as nice as any of the urns offered at the funeral home, for a fraction of the cost. The urn looked beautiful and came with a very nice soft bag. The urn was very sturdy and sealed up nicely. Even the funeral home was surprised by the quality. I highly recommend this product, not only if you’re on a budget or just need a quality urn. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This was a very important purchase for me. My father passed away unexpectedly and I have been in search of something that is perfect and represented him. Nothing flashy, simple yet beautiful because he was a very wonderful person inside and out. The shipping was very fast, packaged nicely so it wouldn't get damaged and was absolutely gorgeous! Looks exactly like the photo. Not one ounce of it was different and was maybe even better than the photo! Extremely happy with it and the mother of pearls holds a special place in my heart as that is what we collected while living by the beach. I recommend this for anyone looking for something special for a loved one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Urn
customer_reviews.text: Urn is beautiful. Excellent product. Our 40 year old daughter passed away in May 2020. Due to the COVID virus, we could not have a service for her. I wanted a pretty urn for her ashes to stay in until we can have a celebration of her life. We were very pleased with our choice!
customer_reviews.author: sandra wiley

customer_reviews.title: It is Elegant and well made. The Mother of pearl is beautiful, just like my Mom.
customer_reviews.text: My Mom passer in March 2019. My Mother is a classy one so of course finding something that matched her personality was a task. Then I found this one. It it so BEAUTIFUL and well made as soon as I took it out I said it was perfect. Funeral homes will charge $500 for this Urn.
customer_reviews.author: 💜

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This was half the price of the locally supplied product. It looked very nice throughout the services. All concerned were very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: frederick r welsh

customer_reviews.title: It looks great on the outside
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with it for the price. The inside isn't polished. If you are hoping for an Urn that's perfect inside and out you should probably spend more money on one. At first I thought the inside was dirty but I tried scrubbing it and it looks the same. All and all I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Turpin

customer_reviews.title: fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: good price, very beautiful, very good quality.... the funeral people was selling the same item for 10x the price I got from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely recommend, this is a stunning Urn the silver goes extremely well with the mother of pearl. It is well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: ... received compliment after compliment because this piece is even better looking than the photo
customer_reviews.text: We received compliment after compliment because this piece is even better looking than the photo. We are so pleased with our our purchase. We even received a kind message from the vendor. The only issue is that the bottom is metal and it wasn't perfectly flat. Otherwise, gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Beerandy O

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Urn
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Looks just like the pic. Very heavy and well made. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: kim evans

customer_reviews.title: Practical, effective, and more affordable
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful purchase for a big deal ceremony. Saved on massive funeral home costs and was much more beautiful than anything they offered (I'm pleased to say it was prettier in person than what we were expecting by the photos on amazon.) The seller also worked to send some very sweet and nurturing extras, and all in all....saved money...more than respectable product...sweet seeming people = 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the beautiful urn, my sister in law would have loved it too.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful urn
customer_reviews.text: Very exquisite detail and design. Used for in law remains. Very large.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lee -Soto

customer_reviews.title: Very  beautiful and elegant urn
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Amazon review. This urn was perfect and arrived bed promptly as promised. Beautiful & elegant and the size was perfect. I received a nice follow up note from the company and it reminded me that I wanted to write this.
customer_reviews.author: marianne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and the funeral home was way expensive for the same one
customer_reviews.author: Seth or Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This urn is beautiful! It was a replace for my dads urn that was purchased in 2001. We wanted a new one for my baby sisters vow renewal and it was beyond what we expected thanks for helping me make her day even more special
customer_reviews.author: STHIRDKILL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It actually looks better than I thought it would. It is very beautiful, and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Nibblins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful URN and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The Urn came well packaged. It was beautiful and well made. The company sent me a condolence email as well as a card. I was very happy with my purchase. Would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: janet meyers

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It is a gorgeous Urn, and if my Mom could see it (and maybe she can) she would have loved it It is more beautiful than the picture, well made, and would do justice to any loved one.
customer_reviews.author: E. J. Naslund

customer_reviews.title: This is the most beautiful urn I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful urn I have ever seen. I would recommend this urn to anyone. I just love it . It took me 6 yrs to find a urn and the second I saw this I knew this was the one.
customer_reviews.author: sally ryan

customer_reviews.title: Pictures don't do this justice
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be more pleased with this urn. It's just as described, and so beautiful! My condolences if you are looking for this type of product, but i would definately recommend. Patsy
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: Simple and lovely
customer_reviews.text: It holds my father's ashes very well. It's beautiful to look at and the design is lovely and simply
customer_reviews.author: Yanira Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: This is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this purchase. It was exactly as described and seems to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia W.

customer_reviews.title: He said the silver band around it was like a necklace for his beautiful mom
customer_reviews.text: My grandson picked this out for his mother's ashes. He said the silver band around it was like a necklace for his beautiful mom.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got it Urna for my husband , so elegant , .... great quality. It’s perfect for him
customer_reviews.author: Delmy Lopez

customer_reviews.title: This Urn is so beautiful and amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: This Urn is so beautiful and amazing quality. I saw many Urns at the funeral home which were triple the price and the quality did not even compare to this one. I am very proud to have this Urn on display. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nursejd

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and really made me proud I picked that one.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and really made me proud I picked that one.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother and couldn't be happier. Thank you.

customer_reviews.text: Elegant Mother of Pearl Urn was very much to my likings , no complains ,right size ,and yes it is Elegant , Gina Krummhoefener

customer_reviews.title: The Everlasting Love memorial Urn
customer_reviews.text: The item is beautiful and it meets all my expectations

customer_reviews.title: It's Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: The pictures do not do this urn justice. It is really beautiful. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDI

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, perfect, affordable urn!
customer_reviews.text: In doing some pre-planning for my Mom, I found this beautiful, perfect urn for 1/3rd the price funeral homes were charging. Not only was our decision smart financially but the urn is absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Jo Thorndale

customer_reviews.title: I am happy, and believe me wife is pleased with my choice!❤️
customer_reviews.text: I liked every thing about the ⚱️ and I believe my wife would be pleased with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Conner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - Just like the add
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, even nicer then the add, great quality, very well packaged, fast delivery (under 3 days including week-end, ordered on a Saturday, from Texas to Montreal, Canada).
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: The urn was beautiful and I received it very quickly
customer_reviews.text: The urn was beautiful and I received it very quickly. Thank you so much it certainly met and exceeded my expectations!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful urn
customer_reviews.text: The detail on the urn is beautiful and the color is the exactly what I was looking for .

customer_reviews.title: This urn is perfect, it is sturdy and elegant all in
customer_reviews.text: This urn is perfect,it is sturdy and elegant all in one

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mantel it’s is absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Robin b.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits our needs and the person it was picked for.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Russell

customer_reviews.title: Just as pretty as the picture
customer_reviews.text: The urn was lovely. Just as pretty as the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Coulter

customer_reviews.title: It was alright. Matched photo, price was right. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Looked great. Matched photo. Some small scuffs and dings in the silver finish, and appeared to be some corrosion, like it was sitting in storage for some time. Overall pleased. Would have sent it back, but it was sort of time sensitive. Initial delivery was quick, but doubtful a replacement would have made it. Again, overall pleased with Urn.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty nice looking on the lead the cover or the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty nice looking on the lead the cover or the coding came off and I had to redo it but the rest of it pretty tight
customer_reviews.author: Mark V.

customer_reviews.title: Received a used urn!! Still ashes inside
customer_reviews.text: This is nasty... Dirty inside filled with ashes. Make sure when you get yours to wash inside, unless you want your love one to have a "neighbor". Disgusting!! I CAN'T BELIEVE I PAID FULL. PRICE FOR A USED ITEM!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful urn , great product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this urn for my Mother’s burial a couple weeks last week. The urn is beautiful, at first I was thinking there would be more definitive markings for the white swirls, but the more I looked at it the more I liked it the way it is. This way it will last much longer. The metal is heavy and very durable. Quality product. The top screws on for a tight fit and the opening was large enough for us to insert the plastic bag top to pour in the ashes. All things to consider when making the transfer.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Gould

customer_reviews.title: Beyond What I Expected...Just Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The urn is gorgeous, elegant and reasonably priced. Additionally, it arrived within 7 days of ordering. It was accompanied by a maroon and gold (pull strings) velvet satchel. I'm so looking forward to having the urn engraved, and then transferring my dear mom's ashes into it. I'm so impressed with the beauty and craftsmanship that I'm considering purchasing a smaller one, placing some ashes in it and gifting to my brother.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Mom
customer_reviews.text: We selected this urn for mom because we thought it had a feminine touch to it and had a Mother-of-Pearl exterior look. She always wore a strand of pearls around her neck. The metal work on it was well done, the white exterior layer caught and reflected the light beautifully, and it was very sturdy. We got an amazing number of compliments on it, which seemed a bit odd. Does anyone comment on how lovely a casket was??? It was just perfect for sending mom to heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Worth ever cent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed for the little amount of money this was..... the quality, and beauty is wonderful. My husband’s ashes now have a respectful place to be. I know that’s not him in there , He is with Jesus forever and forever and forever and I can’t wait till we meet again!!!! He was saved, and loved our Lord Jesus....... that’s how I know he is in heaven with him!!! Thank you Lord!! Amen and Amen
customer_reviews.author: C. V.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Beautiful Urn
customer_reviews.text: The urn was beautiful. It was great quality and was used for my father in law. The family was very please with the presentation. The urn was entombed so I am sure it will be well protected for years to come. Thank you so much for the lovely urn.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Very Beautiful Urn (and well made)
customer_reviews.text: This urn looked as good or better than the photo. It was very nice, well-made, and met all of our expectations (and received many compliments). It has a screw-on lid which is important IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent selection!
customer_reviews.text: After finding myself planning arrangements, I needed to feel that I selected an urn that was as classy as the person who had expired. This urn was everything that the vendor described and more - very elegant. You WILL NOT be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this urn. It is flawless. I purchased this for my father. I'm very please. However, I ordered the matching keepsake urns and I'm terribly disappointed in which I'll detail in its own review.
customer_reviews.author: Patty D

customer_reviews.title: Pretty.
customer_reviews.text: This was prettier than I expected. I was afraid it would look cheap but it wasn't at all. Mother of pearl was truly brilliant and I thought it was perfect for my Mother In Law's ashes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Defects
customer_reviews.text: My father died and I needed a urn. I was pleased with the price. But I received a urn with defects in the silver decoration of the urn. I was so disappointed because it was so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Hall Crew

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !!! Great product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Urn for my Mom in law’s ashes ! The design is so elegant and the workmanship is of very good quality
customer_reviews.author: MaChel NYC

customer_reviews.title: High quality and affordable
customer_reviews.text: We could not have been happier with the urn. It is heavy and the finish and trim are perfect. Our funeral home wanted nearly four times the cost and this was every bit as beautiful as the ones they were selling.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Johansen

customer_reviews.title: HIgh Quality and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. High quality. We love how this urn looks and feels. I was very happy to learn that it has a screw on lid. Many ceramic ones come with glue and you have to glue the top on. Wonderful way to honor a loved ones ashes.
customer_reviews.author: David Banda

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this. The delivery was very fast so that made me even happier. Nice and very elegant looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: So pretty I almost wish I was dead! lol All kidding aside it's simply gorgeous. I bought the matching keepsakes as well and they're equally beautiful. I'd highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, beautiful...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast. Very solid heavy feel to it. Beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Sci fi Dave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's for a glass niche and it's a perfect match for the other urn I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Ming

customer_reviews.title: I am happy. I bought this for my husbands mom ashes ...
customer_reviews.text: I am happy. I bought this for my husbands mom ashes and he loves it. It’s comforting ordering an urn online that looks just like the picture. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money spent!
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing and well made. I would recommend this to any one whom requires it." comment also as a Amazon review?
customer_reviews.author: James F. Silva

customer_reviews.title: I am beyond angry
customer_reviews.text: I receive this urn for my mother. I haven't had it longer than 5 minutes. I open it and there is a rolled up blunt/joint of marijuana in what is to be my Mothers urn. WTF I am beyond livid.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mother. She would approve. It is very nice and made well. I think my money was well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Ondia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality and superb craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful urn! The quality craftsmanship and attention to detail are amazing. Thank you for such a beautiful piece.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful- very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Looked even better when it arrived than the pictures. Very happy with the detail work as well

customer_reviews.title: excellent fit and finish and a fitting resting place for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, excellent fit and finish and a fitting resting place for my mother's remains.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas G Karcz

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful urn. Much prettier than the selection at the funeral home. Glad I had looked at Amazon before I went to make arrangements because none of the ones there looked like my mom. Pricing is much more reasonable, too.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely crafted.
customer_reviews.text: I can see the quality of construction. I’m sure I’ll be very content for eternity here!
customer_reviews.author: Paul s.

customer_reviews.title: Cremation Urn
customer_reviews.text: The cremation urn I ordered is absolutely beautiful! I am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, well crafted urn. Very fast delivery.

product_meta.title: Everlasting Love Beautiful and Timeless White Adult Cremation Urn For Human Ashes - This Large Elegant Mother of Pearl Enamel and Nickel Urn Is a Perfect Tribute to Honor Your Loved One - w Velvet Bag
feature_bullets: GIVE YOUR LOVED ONE THE QUALITY THEY DESERVE - When you've lost someone close you need a high quality urn to hold their ashes and act as a fitting tribute to the love you shared. This beautiful solid cremation urn is handcrafted and engraved to give your loved one's remains the superior quality they deserve.

BEAUTIFUL AND DURABLE - This adult urn is 10.5 inches tall and 7 inches wide. Capacity of 200 cubic Inches, capable of holding the remains of a 200lb person. This adult urn is handcrafted from high grade sturdy aluminum alloy.

A BEAUTIFUL ETHEREAL WHITE FINISH THAT WILL WARM YOUR HEART - This funeral urn for human ashes is a perfect memory of the life and love you shared. It also makes a touching gift for the members of your family who would also like a lasting reminder of the deceased.

HANDCRAFTED FROM HIGH GRADE ALUMINUM ALLOY WITH MOTHER OF PEARL FINISH- The superior craftsmanship and materials that have gone into making this cremation urn ensures the ashes of your loved one are completely protected and given the utmost of respect.

THIS URN WILL LEAVE YOU COMPLETELY SATISFIED OR FULL REFUND - Trupoint Memorials is a company who cares for you, your family, and your late loved one. If for any reason you are not completely satisfied, just return it for a full refund.
